text: why is this music so wonderful something in me is moving when i listen to this ...something deep in my soul it is as if the music talks to me ... to my soul ... wonderful whoever made it
author: druw davis

text: Coincidentally, every song has been getting calmer now...I guess it's time for bed now. Cheers.
author: SwissCheesy_ez

text: THIS GAME IS CRAZY AMAZING. not to mention this OST is truly a work of art... nothing puts me at ease quite like the soothing sounds of cube puzzles =]
author: kamakazikilla

text:
Super honored by this (AND of course the Monolith video)! 
If you guys like the Qbeh-1 soundtrack, I'm releasing my new album on Bandcamp next week, mayhaps you'll enjoy that too :) Here's a preview track: www.soundcloud.com/launchablesocks/earl-grey
author: Launchable Socks

text: This is why I love Supradarky, he introduces me to so much new music that I probably never would have had the chance to hear (I don't play many video games, just love the history, music , etc) This is amazing, I only had to listen to one composition to know I love your work. Congrats on the new album and keep it up! ðŸ˜Š
author: beatlechick14

text: +Launchable Socks you are an excellent composer and nothing would make me happier than if there was a sequel to this game and i got to hear more of your work =]
author: kamakazikilla

text: Thanks guys! Qbeh-1 actually is a prequel to a game simply called Qbeh (it's on Desura for free!) and you can always hear more of my work on Bandcamp and Soundcloud! <3
author: Launchable Socks

text: It's lovely, but the the game play is painfully repetitive. Take block, place block, no story, weeee.
author: Brainstrain91

text: This is really atmospheric and chill. I like it a lot.
author: Ryan O'Mullan

text: Lovely lullaby bit at the end.
author: Sephiko

text: My favorite 1st person puzzler of all time right there, in good company with Antichamber and the Portal series. The soundtrack played a big part in creating its amazing atmosphere, with each level having its own theme. This reminds me that I need to try The Talos Principle, but it will be a while until Fallout 4 gets its claws off me.
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky Never heard of this game.  Will check it out now!  I really like the song.
author: terracannon876

text: +SupraDarky Have you played Q.U.B.E.? It was pretty fun.
author: C R

text: +Nerdle R I actually did and I really liked it! That reminds me that I'll probably upload a track from that game at some point as well.
author: SupraDarky

text:
+SupraDarky Qbeh-1 is so good, so relaxing to play, and its OST is wonderful. 
If you like 1st Person puzzler, you need to do The Talos Principle and its DLC Road To Gehenna, they are at least as good (if not better) as Portal 2.
author: ReHawkNRoll
